name: nodepktanalyzer
description: A visual network packaet anyliser using an ESP32 and node

scripts.lintall: echo '=> linting all the JS' && jshint js/*.js
scripts.mincss: echo '=> minify main.css' && cleancss css/main.css -o css/main.min.css
scripts.minjs: echo '=> minify clientside js (main.js)' && uglifyjs js/main.js -o js/main.min.js
scripts.prestart: echo '=> First I must min you css and transpile you react js/jsx!!' && npm run mincss -s && npm run babel

author: nathanbuckley
